text:
Sticks and Brains - Palo Alto - iOS Engineer - Remote Possible

Looking for an experienced iOS engineer to help us iterate on Lynk Messenger (http://lynkmessenger.com), a messaging app that enables people to connect or start groups with anyone in the same room.

Current team has years of experience growing one of the biggest messaging apps on the planet. We're iterating quickly and need help speeding things up further. Remote OK, local preferred.
